title: THE NEW CLIENT CRASHED MY WHOLE INTERNET CONNECTION???
body:
Since 3 p.m. Today, after I updated my client to the newest version, I could not play any single game without having disconnected. The worse thing is my whole internet line was shutdown with that. Even when I reoppened client, it came back after a few minutes. As soon as I turned it off, everything went back to normal. 

Lost 2 ranked game in my provisional streak after 6 wins in a row. What can you do? Provide me with an answer. 

Account: JoeLo

replies.body:
Hey JoeLo,

This is very unusual behavior, and I can't say I'm aware of the League of Legends client causing issues like the one you described. Are you still having connection issues now?
